main event: A pilot spotted an orange, erratic object descending near Syracuse, New York on 25/05/22.
interesting points: The object was observed for only 2 seconds.
The object's movement was described as 'orange, erratic down'.
The report states there is 'insufficient data for evaluation'.
The sighting was reported by a pilot from the 49th Fighter Interceptor Squadron.
The weather conditions at the time were reported as 'good', with unlimited visibility.
